body.p: 1. Son of Sheshan’s daughter and of Jarha, Sheshan’s Egyptian slave. Attai was from Judah’s tribe (1 Chr 2:35-36).
2. Warrior from Gad’s tribe who joined David at Ziklag in his struggle against King Saul (1 Chr 12:11).
3. Son of King Rehoboam of Judah by Maachah, and Solomon’s grandson (2 Chr 11:20).
